Reviews.Content: havent stayed comfort inn pleasantly surprised marathon weekend stayed team truman beds firm comfortable sheets soft scratchy plenty pillows minifridge microwave clean quiet towels plush soft bathroom shower water pressure lots hot water extra light shower nice free breakfast average usuals plus waffles biscuits sausage gravy 3 kinds fresh fruit regular skim milk minus coffee weak lot kids planned ran fruit service front desk efficient friendly rate 70 hotels weekend 12 miles downtown interstate driving quick downtown except rush hour left single lane exit driving east tends slow traffic hotels fault aware

Reviews.Title: “Musty and Humid Rooms”
Reviews.Author: lsglitter88
Reviews.Content: outside hotel looked decent lady front desk nice helpful pool closed cleaning notified soon 5 swimming glance looked clean nice queen beds fridge desk couch etc butthe couch blankets beds carpet wet soaking humid suitcase trunk car clothes wouldnt damp smelly flushed toilet teeny tiny bathroom vent noise running woke son twice breakfast okay except hard boiled tasted weeks leftovers dad gag trip memphis 80 city run abandoned buildings closed businesses stopped elvis house unsafe walking street definately expected

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Has Ants and Worst Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: AccurateDescriptions
Reviews.Content: looked nice walked ants starting shortly thereafter ants tables sheets pillowcases etc ants ice machine vending time 20 ants table wasnt food worst breakfast muffins danishes oatmeal english muffins biscuits hard rock gravy cold waffle batter runny wasnt edible afternoon keys didnt left note housekeeping clean bed leave toiletries towels etc moved note table disregarded checked stayed 2 days tried charge safe warranty watch receipt carefully charge daily separately receipt swimming pool looked dirty wasnt option guests using swimming pool complained choice hotels received credit nights hotel stay
